mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO cr_idea_aduit_log ( dsp_id, advertiser_id, dsp_advertiser_id, dsp_idea_id, type, title, click_url, android_url, ios_url, update_time, operator_name, status, operator_id, create_time, last_status, category ) VALUES
( #{item.dspId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.advertiserId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.dspAdvertiserId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.dspIdeaId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.clickUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.androidUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.iosUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.operatorName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.operatorId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.lastStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.category,jdbcType=INTEGER} )
